comments_since_last_sample.body: Sky you must've been screaming or yelling a lot lately, where is your voice?
This man had to be  partying  the night  before
I remember the old version of this. I made it twice in years past and again this past Halloween (a few days ago) and once again it was a hit. Very strong but people were downing it like juice
Ngl, rum, vodka, and gin don't really go together, along with coconut rum as well....its a strong drink, but it doesn't seem that good....
